Title: DUI
Writer: Ivan Raimi, Sam Raimi (based on characters created by), Sam Raimi (developed for television by), Ivan Raimi (developed for television by), Tom Spezialy (developed for television by), William Bromell (story editor)
Actors: Bruce Campbell, Ray Santiago, Dana DeLorenzo, Ted Raimi
Plot: Ash goes on the hunt for his beloved Delta, but becomes the hunted. Ruby and Kelly engage in a battle royale with the evil spawn while Pablo suffers from a new Necronomicon condition.
